text:
When the Board of Supervisors adopts any resolution transferring any Real Property from one department to another under this Article, the Director of Property shall keep a copy of the resolution in his or her office and make the necessary record of the transfer. 
(Formerly Sec. 23.16; added by Ord. No. 7919 (1939), Sec. 7; amended and renumbered by Ord. 15-01, File No. 001965, App. 2/2/2001. Former Sec. 23.19 was renumbered as 23.26. by Ord. 15-01.)
